description: Dvorak-Booster (ASCII) in Karabiner: AltGr=right_command layer, CapsLock toggle=right_option, physical CapsLock types ; (AltGr gives :) and Cmd shortcuts stay QWERTY (annotated)

manipulators.description: Gate remaps: while left_command held, enable Cmd passthrough. So, all shortcuts like Cmd+C or Cmd+V etc work the same way they do on a regular QWERTY layout.
AltGr key: while right_command held, enable AltGr layer
CapsLock key: right_option toggles caps_lock
Physical caps_lock types semicolon
Physical caps_lock types semicolon
